Summary: huge white glowing and flashing with red and blue that would pulsate from outer edges in. circular and not a plane or anything star
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the side streets near the intersection of I-35 and I-29 in Kansas City Missouri, slightly off to the west. The object was so bright it was like shining down on us. No star or plane ever has looked like this! huge white glowing and flashing with red and blue that would pulsate from outer edges in. circular and not a plane or anything star. I could not look away. I was in a transe. I kept thinking it was gonna move and then it would just blink out and the blue and red pulsating colors would switch sides of the twinkliy like bright white orb. It never moved. We had to leave.
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around November 9th 2012
